# Display product differences on broken tag link hover (2025-12-05 14:06Z)

_**User (2025-12-03 16:38Z)**_

in the product catalog, if a product's tag link is broken, then when the user rolls over the broken link symbol, describe only what is different between the parent master item and this specific product.
